summary: A simple female Armour set for sneaky type characters. (Dream Girl, UNP)
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow][size=4][center]Kitten by Neo[/center][/size][/color][/b]
[b][color=yellow][size=3][center]Created by Meister aka Neovinci[/center][/size][/color][/b]





[center][youtube]WH19sz_uWsk[/youtube][/center][center]
by kasprutz (Dancing character : Selene kate - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36993/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36993/? [/url])



[youtube]m_xn732FYRo[/youtube]

Dream Girl TBBP (Modified by DanielTDrea and Neo)[/center]

This is a female Armour set for sneaky type characters.

Originally it made as a limited edition for my local community members.

But now, I found Petrovich's new pretty body type "Dream Girl", and I thought DG type will be well matched with it. so I converted and release on NEXUS.

[b][color=yellow][size=3]now Dream Girl BBP, TBBP, UNPBB BBP and TBBP version available.[/size][/color][/b]


- Black and White set.

- Tail and No Tail.

- Glass and Ebony material.

- Light and Heavy types.

- Helmets not support for Argonian and Khajit races.

- You can't make it at any forge. but can temper.

- You can get these armours in a bag near by Riverwood Village(Screenshot).
It will be respawned few days after you got. (in game time)





- I know this is very lore-unfriendly. so don't talk about lore-things.





- There is possibility contorted unnaturally with some active poses.

especially when you mix with other armours.

- Use 7z tool, Unzip and Drag into DATA folder where your Skyrim is installed.

(..STEAM/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)




[b][color=yellow]- It based on Dream Girl Body type but UNP characters can use it.

- I'm not considering to convert to other body types.[/color][/b]





[b][color=yellow][size=3]Requirements before use it[/size][/color][/b]

for DG version : Petrovich's "Dream Girl" Body - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41443/?

for UNPBB TBBP : UNPBB TBBP Meshes - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43083/?

or UNPB TBBP Body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900/?

Skyrim





[b][color=yellow][size=3]Credit[/size][/color][/b]

For new pretty body and base normal textures,
Petrovich's "Dream Girl" : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41443/?

For cute Hair for Kitten Helmets,
Radioragae's "Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only" : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110/?

For nice poses and his works shown example images,
Halofarm : http://mod.dysintropi.me/

My UNPBB Body(TBBP)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43083/?

dimon99 for DIMONIZED UNP female body
: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?

Calyps for nice UNPB female body.
MrTroubleMaker and XP32
MrTroubleMaker Clothing : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/?
UNPB Redux : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900/?

Hellosanta for nice textures, SG Female Textures Renewal.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?

tktk1 for Enhanced Character Edit.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?

Skulltyrant for custom Skeleton Replacers TBBP
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16712/?

xp32, for the skeleton
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800/?

fore for the very nice tool set - FNIS
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811/?

Naver "Testinghall" members.

Naver "Elderscroll7" members.

Naver "Escroll" members.

Blender developers.

Bethesda.

and my thief girl "Tsuntsun".
